name: HotHotNot
description:
FINLAND IS BURNING! OH NO!

And the only hope we have left is the mighty old PAKKASUKKO!

Control the Pakkasukko with WASD-, or Arrow-keys in this PSYCHEDELIC topdown roguelike-actiongame!

Shoot the evil evil MÖÖMINHOUSES with your snowflakes and clear the wildfires with water! After each RANDOMLY-generated level upgrade or heal your character!

How long can you survive? The future of SUOMI is in your hands...

HotHotNot was done in ASM18-gamejam with a theme "hot hot hot".

~36 hours in development, solo project.
